page.title: 15 Entertainment
page.content: {An impression of a disco As I went through the door the lights buzzed as the electric was turned on. The lights started flashing,the whole place was lit up.A heavy metal pop group stepped onto the stage immediatley the sound of electric guitars,drums and cymbols increased by two enourmous loudspeakers.Four breakdancers danced and jumped at the back of the stage.On the floor every one was dancing there heart out. {Country disco}The disco lasted from 8.30_11.00.As I went in the door I saw coloured flashing lights.A record played loud music_very exciting.A disc jockey played records favourites ones could be requested.At 9.45 there was a break for refreshments.There were competitions for the best disco dancer body popper and the best rock'n'roller.
